title: Jekyll and Hyde

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dr. Jekyll is a random event in which Dr. Jekyll appears and urgently asks the player for help. If talked to, he requests a clean herb of the player. If the player has a herb in their inventory, he will take it and give them a potion, but if the player has no herbs he will give the player a Strength potion (2) before disappearing, saying he isn't safe with it. He will not accept noted herbs.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Jekyll and Hyde

Dr. Jekyll is a random event in which Dr. Jekyll appears and urgently asks the player for help. If talked to, he requests a clean herb of the player. If the player has a herb in their inventory, he will take it and give them a potion, but if the player has no herbs he will give the player a Strength potion (2) before disappearing, saying he isn't safe with it. He will not accept noted herbs.

The list, which potion Dr. Jekyll gave for the herb:

Dr. Jekyll transforms into Mr. Hyde.
Herb Potion Profit
N/A Strength potion(2) 168
Guam leaf Strength potion(4) 301
Marrentill Antipoison(4) 165
Tarromin Attack potion(4) −135
Harralander Restore potion(4) −643
Ranarr weed Energy potion(4) −6,956
Toadflax Defence potion(4) −2,386
Irit leaf Agility potion(4) −493
Avantoe Super attack(4) −1,998
Kwuarm Super energy(4) 733
Snapdragon Super strength(4) −10,140
Cadantine Super restore(4) 13,210
Lantadyme Super defence(4) −502
Dwarf weed Magic potion(4) −1,012
Torstol Stamina potion(4) −2,765

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
13 October 2016
(update)

The Jekyll random event can now ask for a clean torstol if you have one.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The event is a direct reference to the mystery novel Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde by Robert Louis Stevenson. It is about a doctor who created a potion, splitting himself into two distinct personalities. He existed as the kind, gentle Dr. Jekyll, and the fearsome, malevolent Mr. Hyde.
  • If a player were to receive this random event underwater, Jekyll would be wearing diving gear.
  • Prior to the update to randoms, if ignored, Dr. Jekyll would turn into Mr. Hyde (level 14-159, depending on the player's Combat level) and attack the player with Melee. If killed, he would drop a potion, similar to if he was given a herb. However, sometimes he dropped an empty vial. Killing him could sometimes be more profitable than giving him a herb, as he could possibly drop a Super restore potion (4).
